title: Barbara Fantechi
text:
Barbara Fantechi is an Italian mathematician. Her research area is <a href="algebraic%20geometry">algebraic geometry</a>. She is a professor at the <a href="International%20School%20for%20Advanced%20Studies">International School for Advanced Studies</a> in Italy.
Education.
Fantechi received her <a href="Laurea">Laurea</a> from the <a href="University%20of%20Pisa">University of Pisa</a> in 1988, with thesis "Secanti di varietà proiettive e applicazioni". Her doctoral advisor was <a href="Fabrizio%20Catanese">Fabrizio Catanese</a>, after whom the <a href="Catanese%20surface">Catanese surface</a> is named.
Honors and Awards.
In 2018, Fantechi received the Prof. Luigi Tartufari award from the <a href="Accademia%20dei%20Lincei">Accademia dei Lincei</a>. She was awarded the <a href="Mathematical%20Sciences%20Research%20Institute">MSRI</a> Chancellor's Professorship for 2017-2018.
